sources.name: Sequential_File_0
sources.script:
source(output(
		bnk_id as integer,
		bnk_name as string,
		address as string,
		city as string,
		state_code as integer,
		contact_no as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Sequential_File_0

sources.name: Sequential_File_1
sources.script:
source(output(
		state_name as string,
		state_code as integer,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Sequential_File_1

transformations.name: Lookup_6
transformations.script:
Filter_4, Sequential_File_1 lookup(Sequential_File_0@state_code == Sequential_File_1@state_code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup_6

transformations.name: Aggregator_9
transformations.script:
Lookup_6 aggregate(groupBy(bnk_name,
		state_name),
	city = count(city)) ~> Aggregator_9
